title: Tripwire
detail: General purpose proximity sensor for Bluetooth applications.
extended_details:
Turn on the lights before you enter a room.  Spook a friend with a proximity-based speaker.  Send an alert to your phone about a home intruder.

Pimp your house with these PIR Bluetooth Sensors.
